Your company recently enabled a self-service scheduling portal for your customers to schedule appointments.

You need to explain how a portal access request can be sent manually to your customers to access the portal.

Which four actions should you perform in sequence? To answer, move the four appropriate actions from the list of actions to the answer area. Arrange the four actions in the correct order.

//IMG//

comments.content: The "Select the Web API User role" action is not necessary in this sequence, as it seems more relevant to technical or administrative configurations rather than customer portal access.

discussion.content:
1. Select Create Invitation for a contact
2. Send the invite code
3. Select Send Password Reset to Contact 
4. Add an existing web role

Select Create Invitation for a contact.
Add an existing web role.

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/field-service/customer-portal-self-scheduling
Sign in to Field Service.
Open a contact record and select Create Invitation.

You configured Dynamics 365 Field Service for a construction company.

The company needs the ability to create a bookable resource to send a group of individuals with different skillsets, along with building equipment, to the construction site to perform construction work for a period of two months.

When you create a bookable resource record, what should you set as the resource type?

though the documentation does not explicitly state that crews are meant to conduct the same job, what i regret.

discussion.content:
Crew:
"• Crew: Represents multiple resources that can be scheduled together for a specific item."
For example, a company might use a crew that provides maid services to represent and define the individual cleaning crews that are sent out on jobs. 

Resource group:
Resource pools enable schedulers to book requirements to a generic pool without needing to decide which resource performs the work.
Resource pools are used to represent a pool of resources that can be assigned to work on items. A pool can be used as a placeholder until a specific resource is identified.
Groups resources for team-based bookings or to allocate them according to a specific business unit or function.
Used to group together multiple resources that can be used to work on items.

choices.D: Update the mobile offline profile to include the correct Field Service security roles.
choices.B: Unpublish the offline profile, update the security roles, save, and republish the offline profile.
choices.C: Access the Microsoft Power Platform admin center to make changes in the Mobile Configuration section for Offline functionality.
choices.A: Access the Offline Profile from the Mobile section in Customizations.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B.

To ensure that entities and fields are available for offline use in Dynamics 365, you need to configure Mobile Offline Profiles. These profiles determine which data is available when a user works offline.

A is incorrect because Offline Profiles are not managed in the Customizations section and simply accessing the Offline Profile isn't enough; you must ensure the correct security roles have permissions to use the offline data.

Selected Answer: A
A is correct
A. Access the Offline Profile from the Mobile section in Customizations.

questions.question_text:
The ability to work offline with a mobile device is key requirement for your customer.

You need to ensure entities and fields are available for offline use.

What should you do?

You are a field engineer for a windshield replacement company.

You did not complete all your tasks on your work order. You need to schedule time for the next day.

What should you do?

choices.B: From the work order, change the sub-status to "Not Completed".
choices.D: From the work order, select Follow up and save the new work order.
choices.C: From the schedule board, select the booking, then select Move to another day.
choices.A: From the bookable resource booking, select Child Work Order and save the new work order.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
As a field engineer, if you did not complete all tasks on your work order, you need to schedule a follow-up appointment. The Follow up option allows you to create a new work order that ensures the remaining tasks are tracked and scheduled for the next day.
